text: 12.88 Part 3(d) requires development proposals for LSPBSL to provide a management plan, that plan should address the following: z  be under single management, with a minimum tenancy length of three months; z  management practices that minimise safeguarding risks; BACK TO POLICIES z  opportunities for residents to create and sustain social networks; z  measures that will minimise the accommodation’s amenity impacts; z  security and fire safety procedures; z  maintenance of the internal and external areas of the building, including communal spaces and private rooms; z  how services for the residents will operate, for example the concierge service, gyms, room cleaning, or linen changing services, and their timings and access arrangements; z  the management of deliveries for servicing the development and residents; and z  arrangements for moving in and out of the accommodation.
